title: Rebecca Pow – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rebecca Pow, the Conservative MP for Taunton Deane, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
Unity, stability, certainty. This is what we need. And we need it now. It’s time for sense. It’s time for Sunak. #ReadyForRishi
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
